name: NSImageScaling
desc: Constants that specify a cellâ€™s image scaling behavior.

items.name: case scaleProportionallyDown
items.desc: If it is too large for the destination, scale the image down while preserving the aspect ratio.

items.name: case scaleAxesIndependently
items.desc: Scale each dimension to exactly fit destination.

items.name: case scaleProportionallyUpOrDown
items.desc: Scale the image to its maximum possible dimensions while both staying within the destination area and preserving its aspect ratio.
